name: gehl-protocol-data-collector
description: digital collection of gehl public life study data
author: Sidewalk Labs Eng

scripts.deploy: npm run build-gcp && cp package.json dist/sql_database && gcloud beta functions deploy getUuid --env-vars-file .env.yml --trigger-http --runtime nodejs8 --source dist/sql_database
scripts.pg-func: cat config/cloud.env | sed 's/=/: /' > .env.yml && gcloud beta functions deploy newUserSaveToPostgres --runtime nodejs8 --trigger-http
